bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, Designs for Women geometry, small tube low stand over frame, double-butted front triangle with ORE DT, 13/15":80mm and 17/19":100mm travel, reinforced disc mount, externally machined HT, forged drop outs with eyelets and 06 replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: RockShox Tora 318 SL Le Femme, coil spring, 80/100mm, 32mm Cr-Mo stanchions, alloy steerer, motion control damping, preload and rebound adjustment w/ Lock Out, reduced spring rates
Alloy A-head forged and tig weldeded w/ four bolt clamp
Alloy, 25mm XC rise, double-butted, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree sweep, 620mm width
Specialized Sidewinder, dual density, slim profile
Avid BB-5, mechanical disc with 6" Roundagon rotor
Avid BB-5, mechanical disc with 6" Roundagon rotor
Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, top swing, bottom pull
Truvativ, 68x113mm, Power Spline, sealed cartridge bearing with alloy cups
Specialized disc, 32h, machined disc flanges w/ alloy QR
Shimano 475 cassette disc, 32h w/ Shimano QR
Specialized BG Sport MTB Women's, light weight foam
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
